title: Lakewood woman knocks gun to floor, shoots self
content:
A Lakewood woman accidentally shot herself Tuesday when she knocked a loaded handgun onto the floor in her closet and it discharged, according to police.
The accident happened just after 2 p.m. in the 10600 block of Douglas Drive Southwest, police Lt. Chris Lawler said.
The woman suffered a non-life-threatening wound to her chest from the small-caliber bullet, Lawler said.
